source_sentence: 上報四恩利九有　　三生眷屬盡超脫　遠離依他及偏計　　頓斷二障出二死　開權顯實證真常　　莊嚴西方法性土　即佛即心非他悟　　心佛眾生無別路　生即無生生四土　　見猶離見見三身　普願見聞共隨喜　　情於無情同證悟(淨業弟子)寶德謹跋
translation: Upwardly rewarding the four merits that benefit the nine realms, transcending all three generations and their dependents, secluding themselves from other-dependency and partiality, cutting off the two hindrances and escaping from two deaths, opening up expedient and revealing reality, realizing true eternalism, adorning the land of the Dharma-nature in the west, where the Buddha is mind and not others, and where mind and Buddha and sentient beings have no separate paths, birth is birth in the four lands without birth, and seeing is still free from seeing the three bodies. May all who see and hear share in the joyful realization of both sentient and insentient beings.
